## Langage de balise.

## Ce n'est PAS un langage de programmation.

# Balises

D√©crire la structure de la page : 
* body
* head
* p
* div
* title
* h1, h2, h3 ...
---

# Balises

![center](https://mdn.mozillademos.org/files/9347/grumpy-cat-small.png)

---

# Anatomie d'une page web
```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <title>My test page</title>
  </head>
  <body>
    <p>This is my page</p>
  </body>
</html>
```

---

# A vous de jouer üèÅ

R√©aliser la m√™me page
```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <title>My test page</title>
  </head>
  <body>
    <p>This is my page</p>
  </body>
</html>
```

---

    <meta charset="utf-8">

# W3C 
---

# Texte et paragraphes
```html
<h1>The Crushing Bore</h1>

<p>By Chris Mills</p>

<h2>Chapter 1: The dark night</h2>

<p>It was a dark night. Somewhere, an owl hooted. The rain lashed down on the ...</p>

<h2>Chapter 2: The eternal silence</h2>

<p>Our protagonist could not so much as a whisper out of the shadowy figure ...</p>

<h3>The specter speaks</h3>

<p>Several more hours had passed, when all of a sudden the specter sat bolt upright and exclaimed, "Please have mercy on my soul!"</p>
```

---
# Liste
```html

<ul>
  <li>milk</li>
  <li>eggs</li>
  <li>bread</li>
  <li>hummus</li>
</ul>
```
```html
<ol>
  <li>milk</li>
  <li>eggs</li>
  <li>bread</li>
  <li>hummus</li>
</ol>
```

# Images

<img src="dinosaur.jpg">

---

# Images
```html

<img src="images/dinosaur.jpg"
     alt="The head and torso of a dinosaur skeleton;
          it has a large head with long sharp teeth">
```

---

# Images
```html 
   
<img src="images/dinosaur.jpg"
     alt="The head and torso of a dinosaur skeleton;
          it has a large head with long sharp teeth"
     width="400"
     height="341">

```

# A vous de jouer üèÅ

R√©aliser la m√™me page
```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <title>My test page</title>
  </head>
  <body>
    <p>This is my page</p>
    <img src="ttps://via.placeholder.com/800x300" alt="This is a placeholder.">
  </body>
</html>
```

# A vous de jouer üèÅ

R√©alisez la structure suivante : 
```md
* Un titre : "Bienvenue √† l'ESICAD"
* Un heading 1 : "HTML ready?"
* Deux paragraphes contenant 5 lignes de lorem ipsum
	* un avec la classe "main", l'autre avec la classe "description" 
* Une image s√©parant ces deux parapgraphes
	* https://via.placeholder.com/800x300 
* Votre liste de course
* Un formulaire contenant : 
	* un champ texte
	* un champ nombre
	* une liste d√©roulante avec 5 technologies du web
	* une case √† cocher

```
